Singlet Code¶

Singlet code [ZMKG23] uses cell barcoding technology to identify real singlets in scRNAseq data, compares to existing doublet detection method and provides a classifier to detect singlets in unbarcoded datasets as well for select cell types.

[ZMKG23]

Ziyang Zhang, Madeline E. Melzer, Karun Kiani, and Yogesh Goyal. Singletcode: synthetic barcodes identify singlets in scrna-seq datasets and evaluate doublet algorithms. bioRxiv, 2023. URL: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/2023/08/07/2023.08.04.552078, doi:10.1101/2023.08.04.552078.
